thread.title: Gorka: An Upstanding Citizen or Immigrant on Monday Doesn’t Decide to Become a Jihadi on Tuesday
thread.title_full: Gorka: An Upstanding Citizen or Immigrant on Monday Doesn’t Decide to Become a Jihadi on Tuesday

author: John Hayward
title: Gorka: An Upstanding Citizen or Immigrant on Monday Doesn’t Decide to Become a Jihadi on Tuesday
text: A member of the public is treated by emergency services near Westminster Bridge and the Houses of Parliament on March 22, 2017 in London, England. A police officer has been stabbed near to the British Parliament and the alleged assailant shot by armed police. Scotland Yard report they have been called to an incident on Westminster Bridge where several people have been injured by a car. (Photo by Carl Court/Getty Images)
